error.desc: A technical error has occurred. Try again later

billion.title: The promotion runs from January 25 at 00:00 to February 7 23:59
billion.text1Block: Condition of participation: transfer from card to card from 100,000 soums, and get a chance to win cash prizes!
billion.text2Block: Every full 100,000 soums = 1 chance (For example, a transfer of 782,000 UZS = 7 chances) The promotion only includes transfers from an Uzcard or Humo card to an Uzcard or Humo card.

text5Block.text0: The prize fund of the promotion is 1,000,000,000 soums:
text5Block.text1: The prize fund includes daily drawings and large cash prizes every two weeks. The minimum amount for large draws is 50 million soums.

text6Block.text0: At each stage you have a chance to win a big cash prize
